import { Button, Checkbox, Dialog, DialogActions, DialogContent, DialogContentText, DialogTitle, Divider, FormControlLabel, FormGroup, Grid, TextField, Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import { FormControl, InputLabel, MenuItem, Select } from "@material-ui/core" import { useState } from "react"; const OptionDialog = ({ options, saveInfos, setOptions, openDialog, setOpenDialog }) => { const [block, setBlock] = useState(true) const [prod, setProd] = useState(true) const [hprod, setHprod] = useState(true) const [inte, setInte] = useState(true) const [dev, setDev] = useState(true) const save = () => { setOptions({ ...options, block: block, environnements: { prod: envs[0].checked, hprod: envs[1].checked, inte: envs[2].checked, dev: envs[3].checked, } }) } return (
{ save(); saveInfos() setOpenDialog(false); }} fullWidth > Options Personnaliser votre éxécution en fonction des environnements. Environnement : {envs.map(env => ( setOptions({...options, [env.name]:e.target.checked})} />} label={env.name} /> ))} Resultat attendu : Bloquante : Execution Bloquante * *Arrête ou pas, l'exécution de Jenkins*
); } export default OptionDialog;
